attributes.additional_details:
REGARDLESS OF YOUR EARNINGS, ALL TOO MANY CITIZENS, AS WELL AS NON NATIONALS OF THE UK, ARE ON BENEFITS HIGHER THAN MANY WORKERS EARN!
PROPOSITION IS
1. THE MAXIMUM ACCUMULATIVE HOUSEHOLD BENEFIT INCOME IS NO HIGHER THAN THE MIN IMUM WAGE.(INCENTIVE TO WORK TO EARN MORE MONEY)
2.  ALLOW EARNING UPTO A REASONABLE           LEVEL IN ADDITION TO BENEFIT.
3.  TAX ALL BENEFIT (INCLUDES RENT) & ANY WORK PAYMENT AS UK WORKING CITIZENS DO!
